 DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN (DashPathEffect)

Detailed Description

The intervals array must contain an even number of entries (>=2), with the even indices specifying the "on" intervals, and the odd indices specifying the "off" intervals.

phase is an offset into the intervals array (mod the sum of all of the intervals). The intervals array controls the length of the dashes. The paint's strokeWidth controls the thickness of the dashes. Note: this patheffect only affects drawing with the paint's style is set to STROKE or STROKE_AND_FILL. It is ignored if the drawing is done with style == FILL. 

 //Example: draw a dashed rectangle with PathEffect on canvas
 //create path, paint
  Path path;
  Paint paint;
  paint.setColor(Color::BLACK);
  paint.setStyle(Paint::STYLE_STROKE);
  path.addRect(0.0, 0.0, 100.0, 100.0, Path::DIRECTION_CW);
 //create a base object - PathEffect
  PathEffect pe;
 //create a polymorphism object with intervals - DashPathEffect
  Array<float> intervals(2);
  intervals[0] =1.0; intervals[1] = 2.0;
  pe = new DashPathEffect(intervals, 1);
  paint.setPathEffect(pe);
 //draw on canvas
  canvas->drawPath(path, paint);

gaia::graphics::DashPathEffect::DashPathEffect ( const gaia::base::Array< float > &  intervals,
float  phase 
)

The intervals array must contain an even number of entries (>=2), with the even indices specifying the "on" intervals, and the odd indices specifying the "off" intervals.

phase is an offset into the intervals array (mod the sum of all of the intervals). The intervals array controls the length of the dashes. The paint's strokeWidth controls the thickness of the dashes. Note: this patheffect only affects drawing with the paint's style is set to STROKE or STROKE_AND_FILL. It is ignored if the drawing is done with style == FILL.

Parameters:
intervalsarray of ON and OFF distances
phaseoffset into the intervals array
